chat.title: Voiding protocol
chat.message: Needs to be changed. PVR should only be done if void is >200cc. PVR cut offs tolerated are different for each surgeon/patient/procedure and therefore this needs to be editable.

chat.title: Vaginal bleeding assessment
chat.message: pls add this for nursing orders along with the abdominal wound checks

chat.title: link to ERAS post op orders
chat.message: there should be a way to include/link/embed ERAS post op orders with post op gyne orders
